name: The room from 3032
description:
The game was created in three days for The Indie Tales Jam.

Story

Picture this, Its the year 3032, and suddenly you wake up, trapped in a mysterious dark room. All that you have is your flashlight and the head on your shoulders. There's only one way out but will you be able to escape?
